00005 // A convenient constant for inserting the long list of arguments required in a BASCommandProc
00006 // All the "command procs" that implement your tasks must have the same signature
00007 // This is the list of arguments for the "command procs".
00008 // (Backslash causes #define to continue onto next line)
00009 
00010 // This argument signature is required by BetterAuthorizationSample.  Don't change it.
00011 
00012 #define COMMAND_PROC_ARGUMENTS                \
00013 AuthorizationRef                        auth,     \
00014 const void *                userData, \
00015 CFDictionaryRef                         request,  \
00016 CFMutableDictionaryRef      response, \
00017 aslclient                   asl,      \
00018 aslmsg                      aslMsg
00019 
00020 
00021 
00022 #endif
